Package com.newmusic.web.service

Class MusicService

java.lang.Object
com.newmusic.web.service.MusicService
public class MusicService extends Object
Music service that implements the different request methods.

  • Method Details

    • addUpcomingEvent

      public MusicEvent addUpcomingEvent(int artistId, MusicEvent event)
      Adds an upcoming event to the list. The event will be added to the pre-existing list and sorted according to its start date.
      Parameters:
      artistId - The artist headlining the event
      event - The event to be added
      Returns:
      The MusicEvent added

    • addArtist

      public Artist addArtist(Artist artist)
      Adds an artist which does not exist yet, and sets its id.
      Parameters:
      artist - The artist to add
      Returns:
      The Artist added

    • deleteArtist

      public boolean deleteArtist(int artistId)
      Deletes the artist from the list of upcoming events
      Parameters:
      artistId - The id of the artist to delete
      Returns:
      Whether or not the artist was successfully deleted

    • deleteEvent

      public boolean deleteEvent(Integer artistId, Integer musicId)
      Deletes a specific event from an artist's upcoming event list
      Parameters:
      artistId - The id of the artist headlining the event
      musicId - The id of the event to delete
      Returns:
      Whether or not the event was sucessfully deleted

    • getEventByArtistAndId

      public MusicEvent getEventByArtistAndId(Integer artistId, Integer eventId)
      Find the MusicEvent based on the artist who headlined it and the event's unique identifier
      Parameters:
      artistId - The id of the artist
      eventId - The music event's identifier
      Returns:
      The MusicEvent, if it exists, otherwise, null

    • getArtistEvents

      public Artist getArtistEvents(int artistId)
      Get all of an artist's events.
      Parameters:
      artistId - The id of the artist.
      Returns:
      All of the artist's events.

    • getUpcomingEventsArtist

      public HashMap<Artist,ArrayList<MusicEvent>> getUpcomingEventsArtist()
      Get all events across all artists
      Returns:
      A HashMap associating an Artist to their MusicEvents.

    • getArtist

      public Artist getArtist(int id)
      Get a specific Artist
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Artist
      Returns:
